name: Neon Everzone
description:
Want to be a game developer? Check out my latest build, made for education and simplicity.  Download the project file for Neon Everzone and you'll have access to all the code which includes:

  • 4+ players that can drop in/out
  • Procedurally generated levels
  • Camera that zooms and moves based on all the players 
  • Top down movement and collision
  • Music player
  • Lighting effects
  • Specialized scripts for lasers
  • Gamepad support
  • Extra debug functions
  • Loads of useful scripts

The game is free to download and play and the project file is more than worth the money. Download the game, have fun, then make the game your own in no time!

NEON EVERZONE:

Explore  an endless maze with your friends while searching the neon lit rooms for door keys and caged monkeys, collecting powerups along the way to fly and hover around the map at rapid speeds.

  • Extensive and awesome playlist of music to jam to while exploring!
  • Play Local Co-Op up to 4 players.
  • Competitive + Cooperative = Co-Petitive
  • The challenges will become harder as your levels go up.
  • This endless maze is generated new each time and the possibilities are limitless.
